snippet: John B. King Jr. has become a sounding board for crowds of parents, educators and others who equate his name with all they consider to be broken in schooling today.
abstract: New York State Education Commissioner John B King Jr is holding a listening tour across the state amidst major changes, like the Common Core curriculum, that have redefined the classroom experience virtually overnight; King has become the sounding board for crowds of parents, educators and others who equate his name with all they consider to be broken in schooling today.
lead_paragraph: John B. King Jr. has become a sounding board for crowds of parents, educators and others who equate his name with all they consider to be broken in schooling today.

headline.main: At Forums, New York State Education Commissioner Faces a Barrage of Complaints
headline.print_headline: At Forums, State Education Commissioner Faces a Barrage of Complaints
